title: Ghosts and Demons in Japanese Prints
short_description: Supernatural beings have always been common features in Japanese legends, prints, and Kabuki theater. The prints on view in this exhibition, all from our celebrated Clarence Buckingham Collection, capture common Japanese folk tales as well as their Kabuki adaptations, offering distinct insight into the nature of these beloved stories and characters.
